summary:
Crypto compliance startup Chainalysis has added four new cryptocurrencies to its blockchain monitoring service, including Gemini dollar, Tether, USD Coin, and Binance Coin.Â 
The new offering coincides with whispers of increasing government regulation on cryptocurrencies
author: Celia Wan
The Block
title: Chainalysis extends its compliance service to four new cryptocurrencies citing high demand and regulatory pressure
